chain_of_thought.thought: Looking at my hand: [2H, 3H, 4H, 5H, 6H, 7H, 8H, 9H, 10H, JH, QH, KH, AH]. I have a very strong hearts suit. The card on the table is AH (Ace of Hearts).
chain_of_thought.reasoning: I should pick up this card because: 1) It's already in my suit, 2) I have a strong hearts hand, 3) Picking it up gives me more control.

chain_of_thought.reasoning: With 13 hearts cards, I have a high probability of winning if I declare hearts as my suit.

chain_of_thought.thought: Player 3 declared intent for hearts with rank A. I need to evaluate if I should challenge or accept. Given my hand strength, I should call showdown.
